remarks.format: ## Remarks 当且仅当此派生类 可以根据在[专用 Xml 规范化版本 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96655)中定义的专用 xml 规范化规则对向其写入的 xml 内容进行规范化时，返回 `true`。Returns `true` if and only if this derived class of can canonicalize the XML content being written to it, according to the Exclusive XML Canonicalization rules as defined in [Exclusive XML Canonicalization Version 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96655).
